first_edit.name: First Touch
first_edit.description: Edit a file with Claude's help
first_edit.tip: Be specific: instead of 'fix the bug', say 'fix the TypeError in login.js line 42'

first_write.name: Creator
first_write.tip: Claude can create entire files from description. Try: 'Create a React component for a login form'

claude_md_creator.name: Project Curator
claude_md_creator.tip: CLAUDE.md helps Claude understand your project. Include: tech stack, coding style, important files, and common commands.

plan_mode_user.name: Strategic Thinker
plan_mode_user.description: Use Plan mode for complex tasks
plan_mode_user.tip: Press Shift+Tab twice to enter Plan mode. Great for architecture decisions and multi-step tasks.

git_commit.name: Version Controller
git_commit.tip: Let Claude write commit messages! It reads your changes and writes meaningful conventional commits.

git_push.name: Ship It!
git_push.tip: Always review changes before pushing. Ask Claude to summarize what will be pushed.

run_tests.name: Quality Guardian
run_tests.tip: Ask Claude: 'Run the tests and fix any failures'. This is the vibecoding verification loop!

multi_agent.name: Delegation Master
multi_agent.description: Use Task tool to spawn sub-agents
multi_agent.tip: Task tool creates specialized agents for complex work. Great for parallel exploration.

first_mcp.name: MCP Pioneer
first_mcp.tip: MCP extends Claude's abilities. Connect to databases, APIs, or custom tools.

web_searcher.name: Web Explorer
web_searcher.tip: Claude can search for latest docs, solutions, and APIs.

skill_invoker.name: Skill Master
skill_invoker.tip: Skills are shortcuts. Try /commit, /pr, /init. Create custom skills in ~/.claude/commands/

notebook_editor.name: Data Scientist
notebook_editor.tip: Claude understands notebooks! Ask for data analysis, visualizations, or ML experiments.

hooks_user.name: Automation Architect
hooks_user.tip: Hooks run scripts on events. Use them for linting, testing, or custom workflows.

ralph_starter.name: Loop Master
ralph_starter.tip: Ralph Loop lets Claude work autonomously until a goal is met. Great for complex refactoring!
